songs.title: Knocc U Out
songs.lyrics:
Better ask somebody, Better ask somebody, Better ask somebody, Better ask somebody
I done been to LA
Man them boys ain’t about it
Shit it’s cracking out here
Man get it cracking out here
Man it’s cracking out here
Man them other cats talking about
We ain’t about it
It’s cracking out here
You bet it ‘s cracking out here
It’s going down out here


Baby Gangsta back again
Got the industry petro
Pulls  along with the same speed as the metro
Same hood same block
But he let them techs go
Balling  cause now I”m touching dollars
Like Creflo
And either way rhymes away
I’m getting paid
But a lot of niggas like to hate
On the great so
I”m ball ball ball ball off
And get it going again
I remain number one
Cause I was born to win
But i knew this one dude
Man he had life twisted
Had dreams and goals
That were not realistic
He had shine and the opportune time
But he missed it
The hood took him under
He became a statistic
I seized opportunity
That’s not my plight
When I realized the hood fight
Is not my fight
But if some drama come to me
Or to one of my squad
Hope you know
It’s time to go
I”m going hard

I done been to LA
Man them boys ain’t about it
Shit it’s cracking out here
Man get it cracking out here
Man it’s cracking out here
Man them other cats talking about
We ain’t about it
It’s cracking out here
You bet it ‘s cracking out here
It’s going down out here


LA LA man my whole city is hood
We about these low riders
Sitting looking sick
In the hood
Every block you hit
Niggas thick in the hood
And there’s always one brawl
The hottest broad in the hood
Sticking grain anything
Getting cushed by tons
Yeah we mack
But first we stack muns and guns
Lay low for the ones
They love to see a nigga caught up
Ask why we bang
It’s the way that we was brought up
Same reason you’re raised
It’s a learned behavior
Just like a crack head is
Finna burn his  neighbor

Religious the call
But all in all
The Gat is my savior
Cause then that bullet graze ya
Man it’ll save ya
Teenager player
Had my door by the hall
BG it is said
Stand for Bitches Galore
Dope dealers got stacks
But they be fishing for more
Nitty gritty
That’s why my city’s
Sicker than yours

I done been to LA
Man them boys ain’t about it
Shit it’s cracking out here
Man get it cracking out here
Man it’s cracking out here
Man them other cats talking about
We ain’t about it
It’s cracking out here
You bet it ‘s cracking out here
It’s going down out her
